title: Diabetes - Monitor Blood Sugar
content: Check your blood sugar levels regularly to manage diabetes effectively.

title: Diabetes - Eat Low Glycemic Foods
content: Consume foods like whole grains, legumes, and non-starchy vegetables to control blood sugar spikes.

title: Diabetes - Stay Active
content: Exercise for at least 30 minutes daily to improve insulin sensitivity.

title: Thyroid - Eat Iodine-Rich Foods
content: Include iodine-rich foods like seaweed and iodized salt to support thyroid function.

title: Thyroid - Avoid Soy in Excess
content: Limit excessive soy intake as it may interfere with thyroid medication absorption.

title: Thyroid - Regular TSH Monitoring
content: Get your TSH levels checked regularly to ensure proper medication dosage.
